page.title: 09THE CRICKETER'S ARMS
page.content: The Cricketer's Arms is about four hundred years old and it was once three houses.The pub has a saloon bar and a public bar. The fruit machines and games are in the Public bar which attracts the younger people while the saloon bar is used by the older customers.My dad is the landlord and his job is to serve and do the barrels while my cousin and I do the bottling-up. The top half of the pub is owned by my nanny who is the landlady.Upstairs, it is easy to see the age of the pub. In the garden there is a well which used to serve the three houses.There is lots of old, broken china in the soil.
